content: a lovely amigurumi bear wearing a chunky scarf with pompoms we ve got two versions of the bear a white one and a brown one and each wearing a different stripy scarf you can choose to copy these versions or indulge your whims and mix up other combinations it s a free crochet / amigurumi pattern by airali design 1 using dhgshop 2 yarn 1 https //www ravelry com/designers/ilaria-caliri-aka-airali 2 https //www dhgshop it/
